Package lt.viko.ad.rdelinda.tinklai.DB

package lt.viko.ad.rdelinda.tinklai.DB
This package contains classes related to database operations and transformations. The classes in this package are:
  • Client: Represents the main entry point of the application.
  • ClientSocket: Represents a client socket for sending XML files over the network.
  • HibernateUtil: Provides utilities for managing Hibernate sessions and transactions.
  • JAXBTransformer: Handles JAXB transformation between POJOs and XML.
  • Server: Represents a server for receiving XML files over the network.
  • TransformationManager: Handles transformation between POJOs and XML using JAXB.

The Client class is the main entry point of the application, responsible for initiating database operations and XML transformations. The ClientSocket class facilitates communication over the network by sending XML files. The HibernateUtil class provides utilities for managing Hibernate sessions and transactions. The JAXBTransformer class handles transformation between Java objects (POJOs) and XML using JAXB. The Server class represents a server for receiving XML files over the network. The TransformationManager class encapsulates transformation logic between POJOs and XML, using JAXB, and provides methods to transform to/from XML.
